contexts.context: ...so the body bleeds out away from you. There is a <mark>risk</mark> here of becoming blood stained if you don't move the head...
...his throat while still holding him from behind, and the <mark>risk</mark> of staining one's clothes with blood is practically nonexistant.
...for your daring, Lord Vivec. I shall not shun <mark>risk</mark>, nor hide behind the mask of cautious counsel, for...
...The Cantatas relate many stories of Vivec's experiments with challenge and <mark>risk</mark>, his failures and triumphs, his blessings of insight and...
